text: Nihsandeha yara bemke base amadera nirdesabalisanbandhe tara amadera theke lukiye thaka naya. Tabe ki yake agune niksepa kara habe se adhikatara bhala, na se, ye kiyamatera dine nirapattara sathe hajira habe? Tomara ya ca'o kare ya'o, nihsandeha tomara ya karacha se-sanbandhe tini sarbadrasta.
